remarks: The real part of a sum.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 9-Nov-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jul-2014.)
statement:
fsumre.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fsumre.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
fsumre $p |- ( ph -> ( Re ` sum_ k e. A B ) = sum_ k e. A ( Re ` B ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d k ph $.
